stsjorbsmod:CharityMemory.NAME: Charity
DESCRIPTIONS: #bPassive: Gain 1 #yStrength for every !G! gold you have. (Gain #g!S! Strength.)

stsjorbsmod:ChastityMemory.NAME: Chastity
DESCRIPTIONS: #bRemember: Gain !R! #yDexterity. Apply !W! #yWeak to ALL enemies. NL #bPassive: At the end of each turn, lose !D! #yDexterity and gain !B! #yBlock.

stsjorbsmod:DiligenceMemory.NAME: Diligence
DESCRIPTIONS: #bRemember: Draw !D! cards. NL #bPassive: At the end of your turn, #yRetain !M!.

stsjorbsmod:EnvyMemory.NAME: Envy
DESCRIPTIONS: #bRemember: Gain !V! #yVulnerable. #bPassive: Whenever you target an enemy with a card, apply !M! #yVulnerable to that enemy.

stsjorbsmod:GluttonyMemory.NAME: Gluttony
DESCRIPTIONS: #bPassive: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, raise your Max HP by !M!. At the start of each turn, discard one card.

stsjorbsmod:GreedMemory.NAME: Greed
DESCRIPTIONS: #bPassive: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, gain !M! gold.

stsjorbsmod:HumilityMemory.NAME: Humility
DESCRIPTIONS: #bRemember: Gain !R! #yThorns. NL #bPassive: Double the amount of #yThorns you have. (Gain !P! Thorns.)

stsjorbsmod:PatienceMemory.NAME: Patience
DESCRIPTIONS: #bPassive: Gain 1 #yCoil each time you play a card.

stsjorbsmod:PrideMemory.NAME: Pride
DESCRIPTIONS: #bPassive: Lose !D! #yDexterity. At the end of combat, permanently #yUpgrade a card in your deck.

stsjorbsmod:SlothMemory.NAME: Sloth
DESCRIPTIONS: #bRemember: Discard !D! cards at random. NL #bPassive: Draw !M! fewer cards and gain !E! additional [E] each turn.

stsjorbsmod:TemperanceMemory.NAME: Temperance
DESCRIPTIONS: #bPassive: Gain #yStrength equal to the number of #yClarities you have. (Gain #g!S! Strength.)

stsjorbsmod:WrathMemory.NAME: Wrath
DESCRIPTIONS: #bPassive: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, permanently increase the damage of the last damage-dealing attack card played this combat (currently, !C!) by !M!.
